job.title: Enterprise Software Engineer
job.description: stronguWho We ArebrbrustrongArgo AI is in the business of building selfdriving technology you can trust With experienced leaders in the field and collaborative partnerships with some of the worlds largest automakers were building selfdriving technology that is engineered to scale globally and transform mobility for millionsbrbrTalented individuals join our team because they share our purpose to make it safe easy and enjoyable for everyone to get around cities We aspire to impact key industries that move people and goods from ride hailing to deliveriesbrbrstronguMeet The TeambrbrustrongYou will join a senior development team responsible for the growth and deployment of global tools to support the corporate and production systems This role will be focused on building new software solutions to provide advanced technology systems across the enterprise You will have the opportunity to creatively design solutions and solve complex problems with codebrbrstronguWhat Youll DobrustrongulliBuild software based in a variety of common languages JavaScript Python JavaliliLeverage web based languages and frameworks such as TypeScript React and Vuejs to create reports dashboards and webbased applicationsliliCollaborate with internal teams and customers to identify new products and services requirements features and interfacesliliBe a key contributor to the teams code basebrliulstronguWhat Youll Need To SucceedbrustrongulliDegree in Computer Engineering Computer Science Electrical Engineering Robotics or a related fieldlili7 years experience in software engineeringliliExperience with TypeScript andor JavaScript and frontend frameworks eg React VuejsliliExperience with SQL and NoSQL databases including PostgreSQL and MongoDBliliDeep familiarity with several core development languages JavaScript Python JavaliliHands on development in Python Go or Java to create production level services that incorporate CICDliliExperience in using infrastructure as codeliliHigh level of comfort in Linux and OSX platforms and development toolsliliFamiliarity working in an end to end CICD pipelineliliGood communication skills  verbal and writtenliliExcellent documentation processbrliulstronguNice To HavesbrustrongulliHands on experience with Docker Kubernetes Jenkins Terraform Ansible Ansible Tower CloudbrliulstronguWhat We Offer YoubrustrongulliHighquality individual and family medical dental and vision insuranceliliCompetitive compensation packagesliliEmployermatched 401k retirement plan with immediate vestingliliEmployerpaid group term life insurance and the option to elect voluntary life insurance liliPaid parental leave liliPaid medical leaveliliUnlimited vacationliliComplimentary daily lunches beverages and snacksliliPretax commuter benefitsliliMonthly wellness stipend liliProfessional development reimbursementliliEmployee assistance programliliDiscounted programs that include legal services identity theft protection pet insurance and moreliliCompany and team bonding outlets employee resource groups quarterly team activity stipend and wellness initiativesbrliulstronguOur BackgroundbrbrustrongArgo AI was founded in late 2016 by industry experts with extensive experience building robotic systems for commercial applications Our oncesmall team has since grown into an over 1000person strong company with strategic partnerships with two of the worlds leading automakers Ford and Volkswagen Our selfdriving system is the first with commercial deployment plans for Europe and the US and thanks to an ability to tap into both automakers global reach our technology platform has the largest geographic deployment potential of any selfdriving technology to datebrbrAt Argo AI we believe that embracing differences delivers superior results We are an equal opportunity employer that is committed to an inclusive environment for all employees
